at.sms.business.sdk.http

Interface HttpDispatcher

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultHttpDispatcher

    public interface HttpDispatcher
    The HttpDispatcher is responsible for sending synchronous requests to the business-plattform-api. The standard media-type is application/json.
    Author:
    Sebastian Wilhelm

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> void sendGetRequest(String username, String password, String path, ResponseHandler<T> responseHandler, String queryParams)
      Is used for sending a synchronous post-request, where requestRessource is formatted as json-string.
      <T> void sendPostRequest(String username, String password, String path, Object requestRessource, ResponseHandler<T> responseHandler, String queryParams)
      Is used for sending a synchronous post-request, where requestRessource is formatted as json-string.

    • Method Detail

      • sendPostRequest

        <T> void sendPostRequest(String username,
                         String password,
                         String path,
                         Object requestRessource,
                         ResponseHandler<T> responseHandler,
                         String queryParams)
                  throws AuthorizationFailedException,
                         HttpConnectionException
        Is used for sending a synchronous post-request, where requestRessource is formatted as json-string. The request is using basic-authorization for accessing the server.
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the account.
        password - The password of the account.
        path - The path to the ressource.
        requestRessource - The ressource that will be encoded into a json-string.
        responseHandler - The handler that is processing the response.
        queryParams - The query-params included into the request.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationFailedException - Is thrown when the authorization by username password went wrong.
        HttpConnectionException - Is thrown when a problem occurs on the http-connection-level.

      • sendGetRequest

        <T> void sendGetRequest(String username,
                        String password,
                        String path,
                        ResponseHandler<T> responseHandler,
                        String queryParams)
        Is used for sending a synchronous post-request, where requestRessource is formatted as json-string. The request is using basic-authorization for accessing the server.
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the account.
        password - The password of the account.
        path - The path to the ressource.
        responseHandler - The handler that is processing the response.
        queryParams - The query-params included into the request.
